column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My Spicy Chicken Ramen (Jinya #1) hit the spot - perfect
column4: crunchy green onions and bean sprouts...delightful. My only critique is that the menu lists that this dish can come in mild
column5: medium or hot and the bartender didn't ask how we wanted it (and my fogged brain forgot to mention it) so it came mild. The soft boiled egg hidden between the chicken was a surprising perfect addition to the soup
column6: which I'd seen but not tried before.
